name: Magpie Family 2
description:
Take the role of a magpie mother caring for her children. Collect bugs in the woods to give to your babies, but watch out for the cat!

Controls (also in game):

when flying: 
WSAD: camera controls
Spacebar: fly

when at nest:
Arrow keys (or A&D) to select bird
Spacebar to feed child
Enter to leave nest

Cheat: Press P to get free food at nest
